snippet: Police said that the man walked out of an Albuquerque home and fired two handguns.
abstract: Albuquerque police identify Armand Martin as man who died after officer fired shots at him during standoff; Justice Department issued scathing report over Albuquerque Police Department’s use of force; incident is 25th fatal police shooting there in four years.
lead_paragraph: Police said that the man walked out of an Albuquerque home and fired two handguns.
